messages.title: Don't risk 5 more years of Tory rule
Prefer a Labour Government? Vote Labour
messages.content: 5 things to think about before you cast your vote

messages.title: It's Time for Labour
messages.content: Never pop up a Tory Government. Daniel listens

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take action that nurtures and supports the National Health Service rather than pushing it towards privatisation.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In marginal seats like Cambridge, every vote counts. If Labour doesn't win, the risk is a Tory gain with the Greens or Lib Dem coming a very distant third.

issues.health: If you care about our NHS, it's time for Labour's Daniel Zeichner.

leaflet.personalStatement: It's time for Labour. It's time for Daniel Zeichner.
